name: Spirit Hunter (itch)
description:
Welcome to the platformer world of the "Spirit Hunter!" Go on a journey to fight off the Heat Spirits in order to protect the world. Lurking beyond that point is a dark and evil spirit that is more powerful than anything imaginable: the Darkness Spirit. You, as the player, must stop them before it is too late. 

(Controls)

W - Jump and Ledge Grab

D - Move Right

A - Move Left

Spirit Hunter is created and designed by Trey Jimenez

Music Credits

Stage 1 and Boss Music composed by Trey Jimenez

Stage 2 & 3 Music composed by Justin Moncada

Updates: I fixed the stuck in walls issue!
